a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Labor force participation rates for women ages 15-24, 2020
Shown is the labor force participation rate for women in 2020 (horizontal axis) and in 1980 (vertical axis). The female
labor force participation rate corresponds to the proportion of the female population ages 15-24 that is economically
active. All figures correspond to national estimates, without ILO corrections (see limitations and exceptions in the
Labor force participation rate for ages 15-24, female in 2020
Labor force participation rate for ages 15-24, female in
Data source: International Labour Organization (via World Bank)
